name: Submarine (itch) (Jurfix)
description:
Submarine is a game in which you have to create your own submarine to fight underwater enemies.

Your task is to build a combat-ready and durable submarine to repel underwater enemies, destroy enemy buildings and submarines and collect items from them that you can later install on your submarine to resist stronger enemies.

Control:

 Creator: left mouse button to place an item, right mouse button to remove an item.

 Levels: move w , a , s , d , firing cannons left mouse button.
